wordpressPost.title: WeSpire Named Finalist for 2016 MITX Awards!
wordpressPost.content:
We are thrilled to announce that WeSpire has been selected as a finalist for the MITX 2016 Awards.
Celebrating its 20th year, the MITX Awards honor digital marketing and technology innovation in New England’s thriving digital innovation ecosystem. This year, more than 120 senior leaders from Boston’s business community judged entries for 33 MITX award categories.
WeSpire was selected as a finalist for the Best Employee Efficiency Technology category, which recognizes innovative technologies that are fundamentally improving how organizations get things done ‘ through collaboration, communication, efficiency and overall output of their employees. In our opinion, this category is perfect for WeSpire!

Employee engagement and culture issues have become the number one challenge companies face, according to Deloitte’s 2015 Global Human Capital Trends survey. And since culture and engagement impact an organization in so many ways, such as productivity and employee retention, addressing these issues head-on is critical to any company’s success.
WeSpire’s platform serves as a positive force in the workplace by engaging and motivating employees to align with company goals and achieve purpose in the workplace. By utilizing behavior science and social and game mechanics, WeSpire makes engaging employees in today’s every-connected world a little easier by building custom programs aligned with corporate initiatives ranging from corporate social responsibility and well-being, to sustainability and volunteering. Each program is built and branded specifically for each organization and is tailored to communicate how to best achieve goals and provide metrics to measure success on an individualized basis.
We’re looking forward to meeting the other finalists at this year’s awards ceremony on August 25th at Boston’s Westin Waterfront, and hopefully celebrating a win with our hard-working WeSpire team!
